Question: This person was assassinated on November 22, 1963 in Dallas, Texas.
Hints: This person's advisors speculated that a Moon flight would be prohibitively expensive, but he postponed the decision.
For the school yearbook, of which he had been business manager, this person was voted the "most likely to succeed".
Historians disagree on whether Vietnam would have escalated had this person survived and been re-elected in 1964.
